title: 取消hat权限的指令是啥来着？？
author: 住在海边浪

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content:
住在海边浪 发表于 2016-7-7 18:17
权限组 builder
/mangaddp builder -essentials.hat

replies.author: Neko_ry
replies.txt_content:
/mangdelp builder essentials.hat
【删除builder用户组的hat权限】
/mangaddp builder -essentials.hat
【添加builder用户组禁止使用hat指令的权限】

replies.author: 住在海边浪
replies.txt_content:
小小马 发表于 2016-7-7 18:15
/manuaddp 玩家 -essentials.hat
权限组 builder
